name: Larry Cooper In High Water
description:
In french for the moment

Larry Cooper is a bored detective because he never has any clients.
But it was going to get milk for his cat that a great adventure began, making him travel outside the city of AtlasCity.

The game contains many references to the world of video games.

(Lucas art games, pokemon...)

Larry Cooper est un detective qui s'ennui car il n'a jamais de clients.
Mais c'est allant chercher du lait pour son chat qu'une grande aventure commença le faisant voyager en dehors de la ville d'AtlasCity.
Le jeu contient beaucoup de référence aux monde du jeux vidéo. 
(Jeux lucas art, pokemon...)
